ui.panel.page-onboarding.intro: Ertu tilbúinn að vekja heimilið þitt, endurheimta friðhelgi þína og gerast þáttakandi í  samfélagi grúskara á heimsvísu?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.intro: Hefjumst handa með því að byrja á að stofna notanda aðgang.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.data.name: Nafn
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.helper.pas: Choose a strong and unique password. Make sure to save it, so you don't forget it.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.error.user: Username can only contain lowercase letters, and can not contain whitespace.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: Okkur langar að vita hvar þú býrð. Þessar upplýsingar munu hjálpa varðandi upplýsingar og uppsetningu á sólar-tengdri sjálfvirkni. Þessum upplýsingum er aldrei deilt út fyrir þitt net.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.tit: Viltu að við finnum út staðsetningu þína?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: Við getum fundið staðsetningu þína með því að senda einu sinni beiðni til utanaðkomandi þjónustu.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.cou: We would like to know the country your home is in, so we can use the correct units for you.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.integration.int: These are found on your local network. Some are already added, others may need extra configuration.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.integration.let: Let’s start your private smart home adventure.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.prefe: This includes information about your system.
Details of what you use with ioBroker
Counts containing total number of datapoints.
Share crash reports when unexpected errors occur.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.need_: You need to enable basic analytics for this option to be available
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.intro: Share anonymized information from your installation to help make ioBroker better and help us convince manufacturers to add local control and privacy-focused features.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.unsuppo: Please choose a ioBroker backup file (.tar)
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.details: This backup does not include your ioBroker configuration, you cannot use it to restore your instance.
This backup includes add-ons and folders, which are not supported in this installation method of ioBroker. You can still restore ioBroker, but the unsupported files will not be restored.
The backup is encrypted. Provide the encryption key to decrypt the backup.
The provided encryption key was incorrect, please try again.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.restore: Backup does not contain ioBroker data. To restore ioBroker you need a backup of ioBroker core.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.in_prog: The restore process is running in the background. ioBroker will automatically start again once the restore is complete. Please be patient, this can take a while. Do not close or refresh this page.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.failed_: The backup could not be restored. Please try again.
The last restore attempt failed. Please try it again.
The last restore attempt failed, because the encryption key was incorrect. Please try it again.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.name: Heiti öryggisafrits
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.confirm: The backup will be restored. Depending on the size of the backup, this can take up to 45 min. ioBroker needs to shutdown and the restore progress is running in the background. If it succeeds, ioBroker will automatically start again and you see the login screen. If it fails it will bring you back to the onboarding.

Your entire system will be wiped and the backup will be restored. Depending on the size of the backup, this can take up to 45 min. ioBroker needs to shutdown and the restore progress is running in the background. If it succeeds, ioBroker will automatically start again and you see the login screen. If it fails it will bring you back to the onboarding.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.restore: Failed to start restore. Unknown error.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.cancel_: Are you sure you want to cancel the restore process and return to the onboarding?
